title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 3.2 - Records specifically exempted from disclosure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23 ยง 3.2 - Records specifically exempted from disclosure

State Regulations

In accordance with Public Officers Law section 87(2)(a), the
department may deny access to records or portions thereof that are specifically
exempted from disclosure by state or federal statute, which include, without
limitation, applicable provisions of the Banking Law, the Insurance law and the

Financial Services Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 23
ยง
3.2

Adopted

New

York State Register May 20, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 20, eff. 5/20/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
